name: odbc_tables
purpose: Get the list of table names stored in a specific data source

return.description:
Returns an ODBC result identifier containing the information 
   or FALSE on failure.The result set has the following columns:
   
    TABLE_QUALIFIER
    TABLE_OWNER
    TABLE_NAME
    TABLE_TYPE
    REMARKSThe result set is ordered by TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_QUALIFIER,
   TABLE_OWNER and TABLE_NAME.
